Hi,

I'm a new user to JUnit and logging.  I've decided to use the latest
v=
ersion of JUnit; version 4.  I have successfully created tests, and
ran the=
m using Eclipse 3.2.1 (which supports JUnit 4).

I am also using logging in=
 my system (logback 0.8.1, but log4J would
be fine too).  Is there anyway t=
hat I can add the test summary
information to my log?  I have been searchin=
g on the web and in J.
Rainsberger's book 'JUnit Recipes', but haven't come=
 up with a viable
answer.

Log4Unit works with JUnit version 3.8.1, and so =
isn't compatible with
the new syntax of JUnit 4.  

Does the answer maybe l=
ie with Ant?  Can I use Ant within Eclipse, and
to concatenate the test sum=
mary information to an already existing log

at, if possible.

Thanks,
